name: Shadowbro Teaser
description:
Shadowbro Teaser is a preview of an adventure puzzle title called Shadowbro, set to be released in 2024. It is not a finished product and should be considered work in progress. Anything here is subject to change. The teaser consists of level 1 of Shadowbro.

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

- 64bit processor.

- Windows 10 or 11 recommended.

- Ubuntu 20.04 and above recommended.

- Fedora 35 or above recommended.

CONTROLS SCHEMES

Move - Arrow Keys, WSAD

Use - Space, Enter

Pockets - P, E

Back/Pause - Esc

KNOWN ISSUES

- No audio.

- Playback of speedrun or recording flips out and goes crazy if you use the savepoint during gameplay.
